testcase.name: postt

error.message:
Don't know how to encode { "city" : "Bangalore", "country" : "India", "email" : "CDL@gmail.com", "firstName" : "Shiva", "gender" : "MALE", "lastName" : "Pavan", "password" : "Siva@0312", "phone" : "9440248752", "state" : "Karnataka", "zoneId" : "ALPHA" } as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("applicaton/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

testcase.error:

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
